mapper.select: select * from conf.scheudler_job_configuration_info where project_name = #{project} and job_type= #{job_type} and source_name=#{source_name};
mapper.insert: insert into conf.scheudler_job_history_info( job_id ,project_name ,job_type ,source_name ,model_type, var_name ,var_value ,create_time ,modified_time ,created_by ,modified_by ,status )select #{job_name},project_name,job_type,source_name,model_type,var_name,var_value, TO_DATE(to_char(now(),'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS create_time, TO_DATE(to_char(now(),'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS modified_time, 'Jason','Jason','1' from conf.scheudler_job_configuration_info where project_name=#{project_name} and job_type=#{job_type} and source_name =#{source_name};
